Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run homer in the ninth inning off a misplaced Devin Williams changeup, securing the Mets' victory.
The Mets eliminated the Milwaukee Brewers in Game 3 of the wild-card series.
Post-Match Reflections: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza celebrated with his team, emphasizing their fun and belief in themselves.
The Mets' celebration included champagne, beer, and cigars, with Pete Alonso being the focal point of the festivities.
